p.k: US baritone John Brancy (1988) performs 'It is enough! O Lord, now take away my life' from Felix Mendelssohn's oratorio Elijah, 'Uzhel' ta samaya Tatyana' from Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky's opera Eugene Onegin, 'Look! Through the port' from Benjamin Britten's opera Billy Budd, and 'Ô vin dissipe la tristesse' from Ambroise Thomas's opera Hamlet.
p.d: US baritone John Brancy (1988) performs 'It is enough! O Lord, now take away my life' from Felix Mendelssohn's oratorio Elijah, 'Uzhel' ta samaya Tatyana' from Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky's opera Eugene Onegin, 'Look! Through the port' from Benjamin Britten's opera Billy Budd, and 'Ô vin dissipe la tristesse' from Ambroise Thomas's opera Hamlet, during the semi-finals of the Concours musical international de Montréal, 2018.
